segments.text: I see the woman facing away from the chaos, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's a waterfall now, water pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's growing fast under her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so peaceful, apron tied neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy's climbing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's wobbling dangerously, he's too high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in the jar, the other with a plateâ€”silly boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by waiting with open hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing treats right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks inviting, bushes trimmed perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she'd turn around and fix the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a negligent moment in an otherwise normal day.
segments.speaker: PAR
